feed.title: Nextcloud News Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Build(deps-dev): Bump squizlabs/php_codesniffer from 3.11.1 to 3.11.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2979
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump terser-webpack-plugin from 5.3.10 to 5.3.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2984
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.18.0 to 8.18.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2986
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.18.0 to 8.18.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2987
  • Build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/password-confirmation from 5.3.0 to 5.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2992
  • Show error message received from the API when adding feed by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2988
  • Fix move feed dialog closes unexpectedly and small style fixes by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2995
  • fix: don't abort opml import when a single feed exists or can't be added by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2996
  • Release 25.1.2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2998

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.1.1...25.1.2

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • remove codecov by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3001
  • Add new field nextUpdateTime to feed by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2993
  • Build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.21.0 to 8.22.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3003
  • fix: TypeError: this.$refs.actions.$refs.menuButton is undefined when tabbing through feeds and folders by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3004
  • Build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.18.1 to 8.18.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3006
  • bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.18.1 to 8.18.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3007
  • Update feed only if nextUpdateTime has been reached by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/2999
  • Update for the docker dev env by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3011
  • Release 25.2.0-beta.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3012
  • Fix devcontainer, update docs by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3014
  • Create lint-info-xml.yml by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3018
  • OPML If title field does not exist look for text by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3016
  • Limit the delay for an update to "in one day" by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3015
  • feat: Add a feed information table that show update dates by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3021
  • Release 25.2.0-beta.2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3022
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.18.2 to 8.19.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3019
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.18.2 to 8.19.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3020
  • fix: sorting bug and style fixes with the feed info table by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3024
  • npm audit fix by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3025
  • Release 25.2.0-beta.3 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3026
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/lodash from 4.17.13 to 4.17.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3032
  • Add descriptions to Feed Information Table by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3031
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.19.0 to 8.19.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3033
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.19.0 to 8.19.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3034
  • ci: ignore handled deprecation notice from phpstan by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3029
  • Fix issue that proxy port is removed if it matches the standard port by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3027
  • feat: show error message from opml import in web-ui by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3036
  • fix: do not fail on invalid time strings by @blizzz in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3028
  • disable new setting nextUpdateTime by default by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3039
  • show url directly in log message by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3040
  • docs: add documentation for feed options and settings for the web-ui by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3041
  • Release 25.2.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3042

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.1.2...25.2.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build(deps-dev): Bump typescript from 5.7.2 to 5.7.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3044
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/parser from 8.19.1 to 8.20.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3050
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin from 8.19.1 to 8.20.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3051
  • build(deps): Bump fivefilters/readability.php from 3.3.0 to 3.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3049
  • build(deps-dev): Bump ts-loader from 9.5.1 to 9.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3047
  • build(deps-dev): Bump squizlabs/php_codesniffer from 3.11.2 to 3.11.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3062
  • build(deps-dev): Bump doctrine/dbal from 3.9.3 to 3.9.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3054
  • Update webpack dependency and cleanup unneeded devDependencies by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3065
  • Make use of stylelint in vue files and update @nextcloud/stylelint-config to 3.0.1 by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3070
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/webpack-env from 1.18.6 to 1.18.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3071
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/lodash from 4.17.14 to 4.17.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3072
  • fix: show error on folders only if at least one feed has more than eight errors by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3073
  • User documentation by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3075
  • Improve mobile view by using horizontal-split mobile layout by @devlinjunker in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3046
  • Limit the max nextUpdateTime delay to 24 hour by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3074
  • Release 25.2.1-beta.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3077
  • Fix build pipeline by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3078
  • Release 25.2.1-beta.2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3079
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/webpack-env from 1.18.7 to 1.18.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3076
  • Fix bats integration opml test by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3084
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/vue from 8.22.0 to 8.23.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3083
  • Release 25.2.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3088

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.2.0...25.2.1

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.3.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updates for php 8.4 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3038
  • Enable support for Nextcloud 31 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3089
  • Release 25.3.0-beta.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3090
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @nextcloud/eslint-config from 8.4.1 to 8.4.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3091
  • build(deps-dev): Bump ts-jest from 29.2.5 to 29.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3094
  • build(deps): Bump @nextcloud/event-bus from 3.3.1 to 3.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3103
  • build(deps-dev): Bump @types/lodash from 4.17.15 to 4.17.16 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3104
  • replace net_url2 with guzzle by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3105
  • Release 25.3.0-beta.2 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3106
  • small fix for #3105 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3107
  • build(deps): Bump fivefilters/readability.php from 3.3.1 to 3.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3110
  • Release 25.3.0 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3112

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.2.1...25.3.0

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud News: 25.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • build(deps): Bump axios from 1.7.9 to 1.8.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3111
  • fix 3114, proxy url without schema by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3115
  • build(deps-dev): Bump squizlabs/php_codesniffer from 3.11.3 to 3.12.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3118
  • build(deps): Bump @babel/helpers from 7.26.9 to 7.26.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3119
  • build(deps-dev): Bump ts-jest from 29.2.6 to 29.3.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3124
  • fix: sort feeds case-insensitive by @wofferl in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3125
  • Release 25.3.1 by @Grotax in https://github.com/nextcloud/news/pull/3127

Full Changelog: https://github.com/nextcloud/news/compare/25.3.0...25.3.1
